Articles.Content:
Hey guys I found the face, and the mountain, but when look for the third one I cant find it, and I used map stat and landed on it. Does anyone have the cords for it?

Thanks
The buried rover is on the equator, IIRC. I don't have coords though.
It's probably buried again, keep hunting with the camera. IIRC last time I found it it was around the raised slope where the two craters meet.
